guide.introduction:
This section will guide you through the assembly of the official ArduCopter kit. If you bought ArduCopter pre-assembled or are building a multicopter of your own design, you can skip this section.

These are quick assembly instructions on how to assemble ArduCopter Frame 1.1. We are constantly updating these pages so come back often to see if there is any new information.

guide.summary:
ArduCopter is an easy to set up and easy to fly platform for multirotors and helicopters that goes way beyond the basic RC multicopters on the market today. The project is based on the ArduPilot Mega autopilot created by the DIY Drones community.
